snippet.title: Guacamelee Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Juan's TODO list:
1 - Put on pants
2 - Put on underwear
3 - Put on Mask
4 - Save the world

Carlos Calaca has kidnapped El Presidente's daughter, and he plans to sacrifice her in order to merge the World of the Living with the World of the Dead.
 
Juan, a normal guy who stumbles upon a Legendary Luchador mask, must find the strength and courage to become the Hero he's always dreamed of being, and put a stop to this. Not for you, not for Calaca, but for El Presidente's daughter, the most beautiful girl in all the world.

Travel the mystical and mysterious world of Mexico as a down and out Luchador using the power of your two fists. Unlock techniques like the Rising Rooster, and open new areas and secrets.  

But beware, for the Hero's journey is a treacherous one, and traveling between the multiple overlapping dimensions may have its own dangers...  ALEBRIJES! THERE I SPOILED IT FOR YOU (LOOK IT UP).
 
Oh yeah, Carlos Calaca is a skeleton!
Oh and you can turn into a chicken!
Oh and El Presidente's Daughter has a dead sister!
Oh, and you can play as this sister in CO-OP mode!
 
XOXO,
 
DrinkBox Studios
